title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not working in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label remains visible.
EB: In the new PDF emitter, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the label should disappear in the preview. Expected result: the label disappears.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label. 2. Open the 'properties' view. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'. 4. Preview the PDF.
